definition: A receptacle typically found outside of buildings, used for the purpose of receiving and storing written correspondence or messages. It is commonly utilized for the collection and delivery of mail.

examples.german: Der Briefkasten steht vor dem Haus.
examples.english: The mailbox is in front of the house.

examples.german: Bitte werfen Sie den Brief in den Briefkasten.
examples.english: Please put the letter in the mailbox.
